name: Power Kick
description:
Power Kick

A platformer fighting game.

Hit the enemies to become dizzy and then kick them away.

Keys :

WASD or Direction Keys

Jump: X or .

Hit: C or ,

How to play :

Small jump or dush: just press jump.

Big Jump: Up and Jump

Down Jump: Down and Jump.

Punch: Hit without any key.

Upercut: Hit and Up.

Kick: Hit and Left or Right.

When the enemies are Dizzy go over them and press Hit to make them fly.

TWO PLAYERS:

For a two players game you have to download the game. 

First player is playing with keyboard and the second one with a Gamepad.

Made with Macroquad : https://github.com/not-fl3/macroquad

Sounds from : https://freesound.org
